Header: Nachchikuda Flood Victims Given Hot Meals
Content: During the inclement weather conditions in Nachchikuda Grama Niladari Division of  the 65 Division in Kilinochchi that made flood water to overflow across tank bunds, troops on the instructions of Major General G.V Ravipriya, Commander Security Forces Kilinochchi and  directions of Major General K.A.W Kumarapperuma, General Officer Commanding, 65 Division provided relief to affected families. Commander 651 Brigade supervised the project and affected victims were provided with hot meals by troops of 11 (V) GR, 19 SLLI and 20 (V) VIR under the 65 Division on Friday (6).
